survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellbeing Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and engagement with digital wellbeing tools provided by the company to support work-life balance and mental health.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital wellbeing tools offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. This helps identify gaps in awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the digital wellbeing tools offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital wellbeing tools have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to capture usage patterns of specific tools. Include an option for non-users.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as checkboxes, allowing multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital wellbeing tools have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How effective do you find the digital wellbeing tools in helping you manage work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice Likert scale to measure perceived effectiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How effective do you find the digital wellbeing tools in helping you manage work-life balance?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellbeing tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as a text input box with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellbeing tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend these digital wellbeing tools to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) for the tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Display as radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend these digital wellbeing tools to a colleague?
